title: Champion Masteries
body: Okay i writing this because of my own confusion, will the Champion Masteries be coming to oceania servers? and if so when?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Crackdogrock,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=a4z2urBi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-12T07:21:06.875+0000)
>
> patch 5.5 most likely if it does.

nowhere in the patch notes did it mention it, so no, it's not most likely. they're testing on PBE, then rolling it out to one or a few live servers, then to the rest of the servers if it goes well.

> [{quoted}](name=Crackdogrock,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=a4z2urBi,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-12T07:48:04.763+0000)
>
> Yeah, if they are testing it, if it goes well, it should be included with it

considering the patch is tomorrow, no. it might be installed later in the patch, but that is very, *very* unlikely.
It will more than likely not be in 5.5. At the earliest will probs be 5.6
Excellent  now I can judge people base don their mastery level.
